long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Play hat is ideal for outdoor playtime, whether you're taking her to the park, the playground or the beach. Crescent-shaped, floatable brim extends around the head for full cheek and ear protection; rear neck veil offers extended coverage. Mesh panels on the Sunday Afternoons Play hat promote air circulation. Water-resistant nylon provides UPF 50+ protection, holding the sun's harmful rays at bay. Breakaway chin strap with cord lock adds security for blustery days.
short_description: The Sunday Afternoons Play hat is ideal for outdoor playtime, whether you're taking her to the park, the playground or the beach.
